name: Verify Planet Scanning Mechanic - Cerebellum
description: Validates that the planet scanning mechanic works correctly, including hold-to-scan functionality and successful discovery.
testObjective: Ensure planet scanning interaction and progress mechanics function as designed.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player has located a scannable planet (not Ladagocia)

steps.action: Locate a planet that displays [SCAN: E] prompt when hovering

steps.expected: Scan animation begins playing and progresses

steps.action: Hold down [E] key again until scan animation completes
Check Filesystem terminal for new files
steps.expected: New file 'Cerebellum.kp4' has been added to the Filesystem

postconditions: Player can proceed with Cerebellum minigame
